description.value:
Make an unarmed Strike. If it deals damage to a living creature, you block that creature's inner life force.

The creature takes [[/r 2d6 #persistent negative]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Negative Damage} and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the persistent damage ends.

If you're 18th level or higher, this deals [[/r 3d6 #persistent negative]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Negative Damage} instead.
